name: Radiance
description:
I was in darkness.  I don't recall how I got there.  All I remember is I chose this path.  Then this ray of light appeared...

How to Play

Radiance is a puzzle game where you destroy creatures of darkness by reflecting a ray of light off of the player and other reflective objects in the room to focus the light on the creatures.  Once the creatures have been destroyed, the path to the next level opens.

  • Move with WASD/arrow keys or gamepad left joystick.
  • Hold Shift or west gamepad button to move faster for quicker movement.
  • Hold Space or south gamepad button to move slower for more precision.
  • Hold Shift AND Space or west AND south gamepad buttons to move even slower for maximum precision.
